title: Be As One
lyrics: __Donna toki demo omotteiru yo aenai hi mo Everytime I Feel Ah attaka na tenohira __kurumareta Heart&Soul; __Hanarezu ni koko ni aru Nani genai yasa shisa ni megu ri au ta bi sube te wo daki shimetaku naru yo I Will -Be As One- kimi wo mamori tai Stay With Me suki da yo Yes You itoshi i hito Afu redasu omoi kakusazu tsutaeru kara Tatta ichido de atta ki seki sa Hoshi tachi ga musubi kagaya ku you ni amatsu bu yagate umi ni so sogu yo ni Futari kasa neaou Love kimi ga subete Ah kimi ga daita yume ya yomikake no hon no tsuzuki koko e kite kikasete Say
